task.title: Creating groups
task.shortdesc: You can organize your contacts by placing them into groups. You can create a group when adding a contact.

step.cmd: From the contact list, tap the + button.
Enter the name for the group in the Group Name field.

taskbody.result:
The new group is created.
You can now add more contacts to the group. You can also add groups that your administrator has defined by instead tapping Add Public Group and entering the name that the administrator has specified.
